favourite.article: For Yichien, my sister in Christ: praise the Lord Spirit that He has comforted you. May the joy of the Lord remain in your mingled spirit each moment of your life unto eternity. Just want to share with you that one of the most favorite sung hymns, Blessed Assurance, Jesus is Mine; the writer Fanny Crosby, had your experience, too. She wrote this hymn, after she received the comfort from the Lord Spirit. May we Love our Lord Jesus more and more each day. The Lord loves us beyond our knowledge. Love you in Christ. Amen.

I heard this song performed many years ago by Willie Hanson of Australia. His father wrote it. When he was a young man living at home his mother passed away. The household was in sad and in mourning. Heaviness and grief. And one night he awoke in the middle of the night with his father playing the piano accordion to this tune "..thou hast turned my mourning into dancing for me....." and singing this joyful song to the Lord. Always has been one of my favorites. It is very powerful.
A very famous child actor in Taiwan, after many sufferings in her life, became a very joyful Christian and liked this song very much.

I woke up singing this song, but could not remember all the words, after crying for the last few weeks about my children, and finally having prayer for this. I woke up with this song. And you made me even happier, by playing it on the piano, I love the piano.

After reading your comments, I was convicted in my spirit. I lost a beloved bird a week ago and I looked for her and cried all the nights and days and I was unable to accept any comfort. Even now it is still the case. However, you Yichien lost a BABY! I am so sorry. I am so sorry. I did not know the hymn, but picked it wishing it was true in my case. I pray it will be soon.

After losing our baby at 16 months, I was in mouring for longer than I care to remember until one day, I lifted up my eyes and looked onto the heavens to seek my God. He strengthened me and beared my grief. Praise You, Lord! You have turned my mourning into dancing by giving me Your very self. Praise You that I have a spirit not confined to my human circumstances!
This song makes me feel like dancing, because of God's wonderful salvation!

Truly God has turned my mourning into joy, after 21 years of drug addiction, my husband is clean. God is good. Ever faithful. He delivered me from the bondage of living with an addict and now I am at peace and content with my husband of 24 years. Praise be to God!
When I've heard again this song, I cried because of joy. I love You Lord.
